name: Pale Dwarf Adventures
description:
Introduction: Play as a pale dwarf, struggling to dig deeper and deeper into the earth, in search for the sacred truths it holds.

How To Play:  Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move around, Space to Jump and hold Left Click to mine stuff. If you are near the surface, you can press E to open the shop.

Disclaimer: This game has been made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam, completely by myself. I will most likely not update it in the future, and it is not "finished" by far.

Theme: Deeper and deeper

Tools Used:

  • Unity 2019.4
  • Visual Studio
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • FL Studio 20
  • SFXr
  • Lots of Coffee
